_comment_description: Students complete a flowchart by listening to a process or procedure description.
_comment_use_case: Listening Section 2/4, process descriptions and procedures
prompt: Complete the flowchart below using NO MORE THAN TWO WORDS for each answer.

_field_descriptions.answer_key: Array of answers for flowchart boxes in order
_field_descriptions.max_words: Maximum words per flowchart box (default: 2, range: 1-3)
_field_descriptions.image_url: URL to flowchart image with blank boxes

_validation_rules.answer_key: Array of strings, one for each blank box in flowchart
_validation_rules.image_url: Optional but recommended for complex flowcharts

_grading.array_order: Answers correspond to flowchart boxes in order

_flowchart_structure.numbering: Boxes should be clearly numbered or have logical flow
